GPU resource list

Below is an overview of GPU platforms available for research by staff at the University of Leeds:

Name Organisation Hardware Access Notes
ARC3 University of Leeds 2 nodes with 2 x NVIDIA K80s, 6 nodes with 4 x NVIDIA P100s Anyone at Leeds BEING DEPRECIATED, please see AIRE
ARC4 University of Leeds 3 nodes with 4 x NVIDIA V100s Anyone at Leeds BEING DEPRECIATED, please see AIRE
AIRE University of Leeds TBC Anyone at Leeds ETA online - Nov/Dec 2024
JASMIN NERC 6x NVidia GV100GL across 3 nodes tbc  
DiRAC (Tursa) EPCC 144 nodes with 4x Nvidia RedStone A100-40 each Annual call for project proposals  
MAGEO PML 5 NVIDIA DGX-1 MaxQ nodes NERC related research  
BEDE Durham 38x Nvidia V100 across 38 nodes in cluster EPSRC funded projects (pre EPSRC-application access available)  
LEARN UoL 1 DGX A100    
Google Colab Google NVidia k80s Free through Google account  
Kaggle Notebooks Kaggle 30 GPU hrs/week Free through Kaggle account  
Gradient Paperspace M4000 in free tier Free or paid tiers  
Graphcore Paperspace Graphcore IPU-POD16 max_hours_per_day - 6hrs/day, Free during evaluation period
